name: mgc-calendar
description: Universal calendar manager for Claude using ICS files - no OAuth required
long_description: MGC Calendar Manager lets Claude create, update, and delete calendar events using standard ICS files. Works with any calendar application (Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar) without requiring API keys or OAuth setup. All events are tracked locally with full CRUD operations.

tools.name: create_event
tools.description: Create a new calendar event and generate ICS file

tools.name: get_event
tools.description: Get details of a specific event by ID

tools.name: update_event
tools.description: Update an existing event and generate new ICS file

tools.name: delete_event
tools.description: Delete an event and generate cancellation ICS file
